processMaps.name: SCAI Content Generation Workflow
processMaps.description: Complete 6-phase workflow for AI-powered content generation from keyword entry through WordPress deployment

metadata.purpose: Base execution role for Lambda functions
metadata.description: Provides basic Lambda execution permissions including CloudWatch Logs

metadata.purpose: AI Lambda permissions with external API access
metadata.description: Execution role for AI orchestration Lambdas with S3, DynamoDB, and Secrets Manager permissions for OpenAI/FAL API keys
Execution role for deployment Lambdas with API client access
Execution role for Step Functions state machines to invoke Lambdas and manage workflow
Structured logging for all Lambda functions with 30-day retention
Full request/response logging for API Gateway endpoints
Detailed execution logs for Step Functions workflows

metadata.purpose: REST API gateway for project management operations
metadata.description: API Gateway exposing REST endpoints for project CRUD operations. Routes to backend Lambda handlers
Business logic for creating new projects and updating project metadata. Validates input, generates projectId, writes to DynamoDB
Retrieves project lists, details, and associated articles. Supports filtering, pagination, and sorting

metadata.purpose: Handle DELETE operations with cascade logic
metadata.description: Deletes project and optionally cascades to delete all associated articles from S3, DynamoDB, and related tables. Supports soft-delete (archive) mode

metadata.purpose: Comprehensive Content Generation API with third-party integration support
metadata.description: Central REST API Gateway exposing comprehensive content generation endpoints. Accepts all generation parameters (tone, word count, image style, settings), supports third-party integrations via webhooks, and provides status callbacks for external systems
capabilities: Accept comprehensive generation parameters (tone, word count, image style, article type)
Content settings: tone (54 options), word count (600-3000), language (57 options)
Image settings: image style (11 options), featured image, H2 images, filter unwanted objects
SEO settings: title tag, meta description, FAQ, tagline, local NAP
Quality controls: negative words filter, phrase blocking, find & replace
Article type: Informational, Commercial, Local, How-To, Comparison, Review, Listicle, Affiliate, Recipe
Third-party integration: webhook callbacks for status updates
API key authentication for third-party systems

metadata.purpose: Route requests based on context parameter
metadata.description: Examines incoming request context and routes to appropriate workflow path (manual entry or auto-population). Acts as the central routing logic for all content generation entry points

metadata.purpose: Profanity and content quality validation with external API callbacks
metadata.description: Validates all incoming content generation requests against a comprehensive profanity filter (420+ banned words). Rejects requests containing inappropriate keywords before processing begins. Sends validation results to external systems via webhook callbacks for audit and compliance tracking
capabilities: Check keywords against 420+ banned words list

metadata.purpose: Send validation results to external systems via webhook callbacks
metadata.description: Sends profanity filter and content quality validation results to external compliance and audit systems via HTTP webhooks. Enables integration with third-party content moderation platforms and internal audit tools for tracking validation events
capabilities: Send webhook callbacks for validation events

metadata.description: Handles single keyword manual entry requests from Content Generation Tab UI. Validates input and initiates content generation workflow

metadata.purpose: Process auto-population requests with history tracking
metadata.description: Handles bulk generation, preview, and deploy requests. Processes multiple keywords and initiates batch workflow. Stores complete user request history to S3 for auditing and debugging purposes
capabilities: Store full request payload to S3

metadata.purpose: Orchestrate multi-cluster workflow with Primary/Secondary/Tertiary article count handling
metadata.description: Coordinates the cluster formation process including keyword expansion, scoring, cost estimation, and queueing for review. Implements intelligent cluster logic: PRIMARY = 1 seed keyword → 1 comprehensive article (cornerstone content), SECONDARIES = 15-100+ related keywords → scalable article count, TERTIARY = AI-suggested keywords managed programmatically (optional, prevents UI overload)
capabilities: PRIMARY CLUSTER LOGIC: 1 seed keyword = 1 article (high-value cornerstone content)
SECONDARY CLUSTER LOGIC: N related keywords = N articles (15-100+ scalable)
TERTIARY CLUSTER LOGIC: AI-generated keywords (programmatic, optional based on budget)
UI protection: Display only approved Primary + Secondary keywords
Tertiary keywords managed in background (prevents UI overload)

metadata.purpose: AI-powered keyword expansion using DataForSEO with question validation
metadata.description: Uses AI to expand seed keywords into clusters with related terms, synonyms, and variations. Includes AI-powered question validation to check if keywords are informative questions before processing. Queries DataForSEO for search volume, competition, and intent signals
capabilities: Validate if keyword is an informative question

metadata.description: Analyzes keyword clusters and assigns scores based on search volume, competition, commercial intent, and relevance
Calculates estimated costs for generating content based on keyword count, article types, and API usage
Places scored and costed clusters into review queue for user approval

metadata.purpose: User interface for cluster review and approval
metadata.description: Provides REST endpoints for users to review, edit, and approve keyword clusters before generation
Handles user approval of keyword clusters and initiates article type assignment phase

metadata.purpose: Store keyword clusters and expansion results
metadata.description: Stores keyword clusters with expanded terms, scores, and approval status
Stores SEO metrics including search volume, competition, CPC, and intent signals from DataForSEO
Stores location modifiers for local SEO keywords (cities, states, regions)
Stores budget allocations, cost estimates, and actual spending per project

metadata.purpose: Monitor API usage and enforce quotas
metadata.description: Tracks API usage across DataForSEO, OpenAI, and FAL APIs. Enforces rate limits and quotas
Controls budget allocation, spending limits, and cost tracking across all phases

metadata.purpose: Secure wrapper for DataForSEO API calls
metadata.description: Manages authentication and secure API calls to DataForSEO with credential rotation
Sends notifications about cluster review, generation progress, and completion status
Manages queues for bulk content generation, prioritization, and batch processing

metadata.purpose: Assign article types based on keyword intent with Local SEO support
metadata.description: Analyzes keyword intent signals and assigns appropriate article types (informational, commercial, local, how-to, comparison, review, listicle, affiliate, recipe). Includes Business NAP (Name, Address, Phone) support, SEO contact information capabilities, and local linking strategies for enhanced Local article type detection
capabilities: Business NAP (Name, Address, Phone) support for Local articles
Local linking strategies (city pages, service area pages)

metadata.purpose: Create generation jobs for approved keywords
metadata.description: Creates individual generation jobs with article type, keyword, and metadata for AI generation phase

metadata.purpose: Queue jobs for AI content generation
metadata.description: Places generation jobs into AI generation queue for processing by unified content engine
Loads article type-specific prompt templates and configures them with keyword, context, and component placement rules
Unified engine that generates articles using OpenAI GPT-4-turbo with type-specific structures and component placement

metadata.purpose: Secure wrapper for OpenAI API calls
metadata.description: Manages authentication and secure API calls to OpenAI with credential rotation and error handling
Stores prompt templates for each article type with structure and component placement rules
Stores raw article content from AI generation before post-processing
Stores article metadata including type, keyword, generation status, word count, and deployment status
Stores user settings, brand voice, writing style, and preferences for content generation
Provides real-time updates during content generation for progress tracking and status updates
Manages WebSocket connections and broadcasts status updates during content generation
Sends progress notifications for bulk generation and long-running operations
Fan-out pattern for content generation completion events to multiple subscribers
Coordinates the article assembly process including keyword filtering, heading generation, paragraph expansion, product insertion, image generation, and internal linking
Analyzes keyword density and optimizes keyword placement for SEO
Creates H2, H3 headings with keyword optimization and natural structure
Uses AI to expand thin paragraphs and add supporting details while maintaining context
Identifies product placement opportunities and inserts Amazon affiliate products with natural integration

metadata.purpose: Generate AI images using Flux, Leap AI (Stable Diffusion), and DALL-E 3
metadata.description: Generates featured images and supporting visuals using multiple AI image generation APIs (FAL Flux Pro 1.1, Leap AI with Stable Diffusion, DALL-E 3). Creates contextually relevant images based on article content with model selection based on user preference

Model selection based on user preference
Rate-limited execution for all image APIs

metadata.purpose: Filter inappropriate images using AWS Rekognition
metadata.description: Validates generated images using AWS Rekognition to detect unwanted objects/content. Implements retry logic with up to 5 regeneration attempts if inappropriate content is detected

metadata.purpose: Create internal linking structure with content formatting
metadata.description: Analyzes content using AI keyword extraction (text-curie-001) and creates relevant internal links between articles. Implements Primary→Secondary linking and sequential circular linking for optimal SEO and user navigation. Includes split300() formatting to improve content readability
capabilities: Find nearest fullstop for natural breaks

metadata.description: Scans content for duplicate phrases using sentence-level deduplication and set-based tracking. Triggers AI regeneration (GPT-4-turbo) for any duplicates found to ensure uniqueness across all generated articles
Stores assembly workflow state, step completion, and processing status for each article
Stores final enhanced articles after all post-processing steps are complete
Stores AI-generated images with CDN delivery for WordPress deployment
Stores internal link graph for SEO and navigation optimization

Places completed articles into deployment queue for WordPress publishing
Coordinates plugin installation and content deployment to WordPress sites via Cloudways
Automatically installs and configures SCAI WordPress plugin on target sites if not already present
